title: [Question]What do they ask for web tech isa 1?? And what resources did you find helpful???
content: I despise this subject so much. Half the topics are still confusing me.....Please help:((((

comments.body: It's usually a mix of both scripting (markup and css) and theory and a little bit on how internet works? I don't remember exactly. U could study up the slides and use docs to understand it deeper, use any AI to explain concepts u didn't understand. There were resources in pes media (a discord server) and better pes (a web app for class resources) but i think the content has changed and some may have even been removed, all the best for ur isa

from what i remember, they asked html plus css tables, something with ajax, like a small code , one was a promise question from unit 2. so nothing too big but do go over syntaxes and the slides examples.

Study anurags slides.
I studied only from them and got a good grade.
Its enough , don't forget to practice.
